Join host Amanda Shapiro (editorial director of Bon Appétit and the founding editor of Healthyish) along with professional chefs, home cooks, and, of course, our very own cast of Bon Appétit staffers to dive into what it means to eat, drink, and live healthy(ish), with lots of cooking advice and recipe ideas along the way.ContentThis content can also be viewed on the site it originates from.Check out the trailer above. The first episode of Healthyish will drop on Thursday, June 17, at 6 a.m. ET, with new episodes released every Thursday.
